column4: Is this for developers only, or can I ask stupid user questions here also?
It is for support and users. #ubuntu-devel is for developers, go ahead and let us laugh. Sorry :)
It just seems a little "in depth" since easy problems are fixed right away, and only the really complicated ones hang around :)
They are called "gstreamer0.10-<something>" Are you sure you have Universe and Multiverse, and not just backports Universe and Multiverse? (a common mistake)
